Catalog_Raisonne: Newland, Perée, & Schaap, Crows, Cranes & Camellias (2010), checklist no. AH.2
artist: Ohara Shōson; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō; Carver: Itō; Printer: Komatsu Wasankichi
markings: LRC, brown artist's seal H.a: 豊邨 {Hōson} | LRC in right margin, black publisher seal: カワグチ {Kawaguchi} | LLC in left margin: 彫伊藤摺小松　版権所有 {hori Itō suri Komatsu, hanken shoyū} (carved by Itō, printed by Komatsu, copyright)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper with embossing
text:
On back: MADE IN JAPAN.

Relatively rare design. More often appears the Watanabe version of this subject, which is very similar: Newland, Perée, & Schaap, Crows, Cranes & Camellias (2001), checklist no. S41.7.
title: Two White Rabbits Under a Full Moon
